shows.title: Numerology Update / Neuroscience of Sci-Fi & Horror
shows.first_half: First Half: Numerologist Glynis McCants shares her numerological analysis of current events and the future, along with updates on particular numbers and patterns, and what shifts to watch out for.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Neuroscientist Austin Lim, PhD, will discuss the science behind some of the most famous works of horror and science fiction, including classics such as Frankenstein and The Strange Case of Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde, to modern masterpieces like Get Out and The Last of Us. He examines the minds of filmgoers and the impact of primal fear on them.

shows.title: Intuition & Telepathy / Open Lines
shows.first_half: Joining guest host Ryan Wrecker (email), Director of Research at the Institute of Noetic Sciences Helané Wahbeh will be discussing the science and mystery behind human intuition and telepathy, including her research on trance channeling. She'll share insights into how people uniquely experience intuitive moments and how we can strengthen these abilities. Wahbeh will also reflect on why these skills are becoming more relevant today, and what future discoveries excite her most. Followed by Open Lines in the latter half. Give Ryan a call and discuss whatever is on your mind!
